TypeSignature.Value: public interface IManagerFactoryParameters : Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, IDisposable, Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable
.class public interface auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit IManagerFactoryParameters implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, class System.IDisposable
type IManagerFactoryParameters = interface interface IJavaObject interface IDisposable interface IJavaPeerable

Docs.summary: This class is the base interface for providing algorithm-specific information to a KeyManagerFactory or TrustManagerFactory.

remarks.para: This class is the base interface for providing algorithm-specific information to a KeyManagerFactory or TrustManagerFactory.

In some cases, initialization parameters other than keystores may be needed by a provider. Users of that particular provider are expected to pass an implementation of the appropriate sub-interface of this class as defined by the provider. The provider can then call the specified methods in the ManagerFactoryParameters implementation to obtain the needed information.
